backend/main.mo: Defines data types and state for reviews, articles, bikes, comments, ratings, and includes an admin‑only function to seed popular bike entries.
feature_evidence.json: Describes feature evidence linking admin-only bike seeding to specific frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries for many frontend files across components and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry document mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/AppFooter.tsx: Renders the global footer with categories, regions, social links, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Implements the site header with navigation, search, theme toggle, auth actions, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper including header, footer, routed content, and profile setup dialog.
frontend/src/components/AuthButton.tsx: Login/logout button using Internet Identity hooks with error recovery and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/BikeForm.tsx: Form for creating or editing bikes with fields for specs, pricing, images, and region, submitting via mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/BikeSelector.tsx: Popover-based searchable selector allowing users to pick a bike from a list.
frontend/src/components/CategoryGrid.tsx: Grid of category cards linking to news, reviews, comparisons, and other sections.
frontend/src/components/CommentsPanel.ts: Displays comments for a review with creation, deletion, hiding, and moderation controls.
Compares two bikes and their review scores in a structured table.
frontend/src/components/LatestLaunchesCa: Carousel showing recent bike launch articles with title, region, and preview text.
frontend/src/components/ModerationMenu.t: Dropdown menu for owners/admins to hide or delete comments with a confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Modal prompting authenticated users without a profile to enter name and optional bio, saving via mutation.
frontend/src/components/RatingWidget.tsx: Displays average user rating for a review and allows authenticated users to submit a star rating.
frontend/src/components/RegionFilter.tsx: Tabbed region selector triggering region changes for filtering content.
frontend/src/components/RequireAuthActio: Wrapper that blocks actions for unauthenticated users and shows a sign‑in prompt.
frontend/src/components/ScoreBreakdown.t: Shows detailed score categories with progress bars and displays an overall score badge.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Button toggling between light and dark themes using next-themes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Returns authentication status, user profile, loading state, and admin flag from related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook managing Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating articles, reviews, ratings, and profiles using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining light and dark theme CSS variables for the UI palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, query client, identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/ArticleDetailPage.tsx: Renders a detailed article view by ID with loading, not‑found handling, and full article metadata/content.
frontend/src/pages/BikeDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed information for a selected bike, including images, price, region, and navigation with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/BrandDetailPage.tsx: Shows all bikes for a specific brand with loading, empty‑state handling, and a grid of bike cards.
frontend/src/pages/BrandsPage.tsx: Lists all motorcycle brands with search and counts, grouping bikes by brand and linking to brand detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/BuyingGuideDetailPage: Displays a buying guide article with metadata, a checklist section, and full content, including loading and not‑found fallback.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryListingPage.t: Lists articles or reviews for a category with region filtering, loading states, and score badges for reviews.
frontend/src/pages/ComparePage.tsx: UI for selecting two bikes and displaying a side‑by‑side comparison with specs and reviews.
frontend/src/pages/CreateArticlePage.tsx: Form page for creating or saving an article draft, handling validation and navigation after submission.
frontend/src/pages/CreateReviewPage.tsx: Form page for writing a motorcycle review with ratings, bike selection, and draft/publish handling.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Homepage showing hero content, latest launches, trending bikes, and category navigation fed by fetched data.
frontend/src/pages/ManageBikesPage.tsx: Management interface for creating, editing, deleting, and optionally seeding bike entries, with admin controls.
frontend/src/pages/MyDraftsPage.tsx: Displays the user's draft articles and reviews with options to publish or navigate to creation pages.
frontend/src/pages/ReviewDetailPage.tsx: Displays a detailed review with bike info, score breakdown, comments, and loading/error handling using fetched review and bike data.
frontend/src/pages/SearchResultsPage.tsx: Fetches articles, reviews, and bikes, filters them based on a search query, groups matching brands, and renders categorized search results.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, store, retrieve, and clear URL and session parameters, including hash-based parsing and persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, features, known issues, and architectural notes for the application state.
